participant_1.background:
I still remember the feeling of freedom I felt when I would dance in my room alone.
i spend most of my days working at my churchs food pantry.
I was once bullied so badly online that I had to delete all of my social media accounts.
I do yoga with my dog in the park every morning before work.
i work as a receptionist at a lawyer s office.

participant_2.background:
My comfortable recliner is my most valued material possession because it gives me a place to relax and recharge after a long day of traveling.
I just finished painting my nails.
i work as an accountant.
i am looking forward to reading the latest political thriller.
I enjoy playing with my little girl.

content.text: Hi!
Hello!
How are you today?
Doing good! I'm getting ready for a long day at work
Nice! I work as a receptionist at a lawyer's office.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I work as an accountant.
I'm sure you're really busy!
It's not too bad, it's just a lot of paperwork
That makes sense. I like to do yoga in the park every morning before work.
Wow, that sounds really nice! I wish I had time for yoga.
It's great exercise! I have a dog and we do it together.
That's adorable! I like dogs, but I don't have one right now.
I'm sorry to hear that. Maybe you'll get one someday!
Thanks! I hope so!
What are you looking forward to this weekend?
I'm going to read the latest political thriller.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I love reading!
Me too! I'm hoping to get a lot of reading done this weekend.
That sounds like a great plan! Have a good weekend!
Thanks! You too
